import React, {useEffect, useRef} from 'react' import Typical from 'react-typical' import "../style/Intro.scss"; import { CustomButton } from '../components/CustomButton'; import {Resume} from './Resume.pdf' export const Intro = () => { const intro = useRef(); useEffect(() => { intro.current.classList.add('landingPage--visible'); document.getElementById('emoji_vid').play(); },[]) const traits = [ 'Software engineer.', 1000, 'Frontend developer.', 1000, 'Fullstack developer.', 1000, 'Game developer.', 1000, ] return (

Hello, I'm Alberto, a

Originally from Portugal - currently living in Berlin, Germany - I am a hardworking person with a creativity vein and attention to detail. Always excited by new challenges, and to improve my skillsets as technology evolves.
Dog person, huge fan of climbing, traveling and photography. Interested in the entire spectrum of software development, with a special passion for frontend, design and game development.

) }
